reviews.review_msg: This professor is so compassionate about her field and is happy to share this with her students. I loved the seminar approach to this course. This professor was always available outside of class time and provided very relevant information for applying to graduate programs in the field.

Best online course taken over the summer. Learned so much about the various theories. She was caring and empathetic and the group assignments were fun to do. ALso shared a lot of information that is helpful when applying to graduate school and preparing for working in the mental health field.

Shereen is very kind and personable. However, the course was essentially taught by the students because every week a group had a presentation which presented the material for that week. She also does not give very informative feedback and her quizzes are MC and take random tidbits of info from a large textbook which makes them tricky.
I was really hoping to learn something here. Talks about being reflective in practice but very much isn't.
Helpful, compassionate and overall made genuine efforts to accommodate student needs. If you attend the course, do the assigned work and keep up with the readings you will get an A.
